heading: taiwan quake
subheading: an earthquake measuring 6.9 on the richter scale struck off the coast of eastern taiwan in the pacific ocean early tuesday but there were no immediate reports of damage or injury. state radio, quoting government seismologists, said the strongest magnitude on taiwan itself was in hualien, a seismically-active area on the eastern shore. in the capital taipei, the quake jarred residents from their sleep and set off car alarms.
author: wired staff
text: an earthquake measuring 6.9 on the richter scale struck off the coast of eastern taiwan in the pacific ocean early tuesday but there were no immediate reports of damage or injury. state radio, quoting government seismologists, said the strongest magnitude on taiwan itself was in hualien, a seismically-active area on the eastern shore. in the capital taipei, the quake jarred residents from their sleep and set off car alarms.
